styles: *{font-family:Noto Sans;box-sizing:border-box}::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}body{margin:0;width:100%;height:100vh;display:flex}section{height:100%;padding:32px 24px;background-color:#191b20;border-right:1px solid #000;position:relative;overflow-y:scroll}.groups{min-width:226px}.groups .item{width:70px;height:70px;border-radius:50%;background:#fff;margin-bottom:16px}.groups .item.add{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;background:rgba(63,99,161,.3)}.groups .item.add .icon{display:inline-block;width:21px;height:21px;background-image:url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='21' height='21' viewBox='0 0 21 21' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cline x1='10.5' x2='10.5' y2='21' stroke='%235893F7' stroke-width='3'/%3E%3Cline x1='21' y1='10.5' y2='10.5' stroke='%235893F7' stroke-width='3'/%3E%3C/svg%3E%0A")}.groups .item.account{position:absolute;bottom:16px;left:50%;transform:translateX(-50%)}.contacts{min-width:344px}.contacts .search-form{position:relative}.contacts .search-form input{width:100%;height:35px;border-radius:10px;padding:8px 48px 8px 24px;background-color:#0c0e12;color:#fff;border:0}.contacts .search-form .submit-search{position:absolute;right:12px;top:10px;display:inline-block;width:15px;height:15px;cursor:pointer;border:0;background-color:transparent;background-image:url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='15' height='15' viewBox='0 0 15 15' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath fill-rule='evenodd' clip-rule='evenodd' d='M9.90812 10.35C8.85625 11.2981 7.46375 11.875 5.9375 11.875C2.66062 11.875 0 9.21437 0 5.9375C0 2.66062 2.66062 0 5.9375 0C9.21437 0 11.875 2.66062 11.875 5.9375C11.875 7.46375 11.2981 8.85625 10.35 9.90812L15 14.5581L14.5581 15L9.90812 10.35ZM5.9375 0.625C8.86938 0.625 11.25 3.00563 11.25 5.9375C11.25 8.86938 8.86938 11.25 5.9375 11.25C3.00563 11.25 0.625 8.86938 0.625 5.9375C0.625 3.00563 3.00563 0.625 5.9375 0.625Z' fill='white' fill-opacity='0.5'/%3E%3C/svg%3E%0A")}.contacts .heading{font-weight:600;font-size:16px;line-height:19px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.25);text-transform:uppercase;margin:16px 8px;}.contacts .item{display:flex;margin-bottom:18px;padding:8px;cursor:pointer;border-radius:10px}.contacts .item.active{border:2px solid #3063bb63}.contacts .item .image{min-width:50px;height:50px;border-radius:50%;background:#fff}.contacts .item .name-message{width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:space-around;margin:0 14px}.contacts .item .name-message .name{font-size:18px;line-height:18px;color:#fff}.contacts .item .name-message .message{font-size:14px;line-height:14px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.5)}.contacts .item .date{font-size:11px;line-height:11px;color:rgba(107,111,147,.5);white-space:nowrap;margin-top:2px}.chat{width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:space-between}.chat .item{display:flex;align-items:flex-end;height:fit-content;margin-bottom:24px}.chat .item .image{width:45px;height:45px;border-radius:50%;background-color:#fff}.chat .item .message{min-width:150px;max-width:503px;width:fit-content;padding:8px;margin:0 18px;background:#29292e;box-shadow:1px 1px 4px #484851;border-radius:10px;font-size:14px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.7)}.chat .item .message .name-time{display:flex;justify-content:space-between}.chat .item .message .name-time .mess-name{font-weight:600;margin-bottom:5px;font-size:16px;color:#3063bb}.chat .item .message .name-time .time{color:rgba(107,111,147,.8)}.chat .item.outgoing{flex-direction:row-reverse}.chat .item.outgoing .message{background:#1f2735;box-shadow:1px 1px 5px #384761}.chat .message-form{position:relative;margin-top:8px}.chat .message-form input{width:100%;min-height:48px;max-height:72px;height:fit-content;border-radius:10px;padding:12px 80px 12px 24px;background-color:#0c0e12;color:#fff;border:0}.chat .message-form .submit-send{position:absolute;right:32px;top:11px;display:inline-block;width:24px;height:25px;cursor:pointer;border:0;background-color:transparent;background-image:url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='24' height='25' viewBox='0 0 24 25' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cg clip-path='url(%23clip0_183:168)'%3E%3Cpath d='M0 12.5L11 15.6L18 7.5L9.844 13.172L5.532 11.97L20.894 4.29L16.92 18.86L13.17 15.521L11 18.446V17.677L9 17.117V24.5L13.473 18.469L18 22.5L24 0.5L0 12.5Z' fill='white' fill-opacity='0.5'/%3E%3C/g%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3CclipPath id='clip0_183:168'%3E%3Crect width='24' height='24' fill='white' transform='translate(0 0.5)'/%3E%3C/clipPath%3E%3C/defs%3E%3C/svg%3E%0A")}.profile{min-width:289px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center}.profile .image{width:100px;height:100px;border-radius:50%;background:#fff;margin-bottom:16px}.profile .name{font-weight:600;font-size:20px;color:#3063bb;margin-bottom:14px}.profile .status{font-weight:600;font-size:14px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.4);margin-bottom:18px}.profile .info{font-size:14px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.5);margin-bottom:72px}.profile .files{font-weight:600;font-size:18px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.4);text-transform:uppercase}
